para.para: Type definitions for the System Timer Registers.

listitem.para: Cortex-M0 Core Debug Registers (DCB registers, SHCSR, and DFSR) are only accessible over DAP and not via processor. Therefore they are not covered by the Cortex-M0 header file.
Type definitions for the Instrumentation Trace Macrocell (ITM)
Structure type to access the System Timer (SysTick).

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: Type definitions for the System Timer Registers.
